short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert all HTML tables in a web page to a XLSX spreadsheet, with each table placed on a seperate tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically extract HTML tables from web pages and turn them into spreadsheets.

Once you have installed your extension just follow the instructions in the extension popup to sign up and get converting! 

When you create an account the free trial includes seven days of complete functionality afterwards some cell values will be replaced with upgrade text.
